entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
